name: Space Stocks
description:
Find the mystery of the space base! You can never be sure what is waiting for you around the corner. It won't be an easy task!

  • W S A D - Movement
  • LMB - Shoot
  • RMB - Aim
  • 1 - Change weapon to Rifle
  • 2 - Change weapon to Pistol
  • R - Reload
  • Space - Jump
  • Escape - Go back to the main menu

Space stocks is my first completed project in Unreal Engine 4. During the development, I wanted to expand my knowledge of game design and improve my skills in using the Unreal engine. My main goal was to create a game from scratch, thus getting to know the gamedev workflow.
